titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend and modify the credit for carbon oxide sequestration, and for other purposes.
Carbon Capture and Sequestration Expansion Act
Carbon Capture and Sequestration Expansion Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Carbon Capture and Sequestration Expansion Act
This bill extends through 2031 the tax credit for carbon oxide sequestration. It also modifies carbon oxide capture requirements.
